attributes.action: suggest to Her Majesty The Queen that an honour of some form be given to the public-spirited individual who has furnished the full details of the expense claims of Members of Parliament to the public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The publishing of expenses claimed by Members of Parliament will result in a substantial cost saving to the general public.  It will also be likely to improve the governance of Britain by making politicians more readily face the costs imposed on the general public by ill-considered legislation and poor management of the economy.

We therefore ask the Prime Minister to suggest to Her Majesty The Queen that she should consider an honour for the as yet unknown citizen whose leak of this information will hopefully foster an age of improved and more open government.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
